extendedInfo.description: Zenscapes is a series of beautiful animated paintings inspired by classical Chinese, Japanese and Korean landscape art.Spring Lake depicts a serene mountain lake, set somewhere in ancient China during mid spring.  A fisherman paddles across the lake in his sampan, stopping to catch fish.  To the north, a junk glides peacefully along while mist drifts lazily across the mountains in the background.The full version features a variety of customization options, from painting in more mountains and mist to switching the scene between beautiful night, daytime, sunset, and dawn settings.  Reload the scene as many times as you want to rearrange how the landscape is painted, and make the scene your own!  Looks equally stunning on phones, tablets, and any device that supports live wallpapers in both portrait and landscape modes.  Please send us an email with a description and your phone model if you have any problems or questions.

reviews.title: Added one more star to Dev response to suggestions
reviews.comment: Need more toggle options and varieties. Promising concept. Nice looking concept but needs more variety and options of themes and backgrounds like the fantastic Luma. Will recommend if improved
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Lovely:)
reviews.comment: Relaxing, beautiful, unique and smooth.... Love these!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zen Zone
reviews.comment: I love ALL the artistic beauty in oriental paintings and each reflections that is put into each meaningful piece of artwork. This is an exceptionally well done LWP, the only thing it needs are  some birds flying in the scenery, \"birds make the flow\" otherwise beautifully done. Thank you for my peaceful journey :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite!
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper. I especially like how you can make it reflect the time of day BUT sometimes big black blocks appear for a few seconds and disappear. Please fix that. That\'s the only reason this isn\'t 5 stars!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Very calming and beautiful to watch. Made me start using LWP\'s again :)
